Advising

I am in the process of setting up my lab, Empirical and Statistical Explorations of Language (EaSEL). Here are some of the topics EaSEL lab is currently working on:

Quantifying word embedding bias from historical events

Aizah Rao, Class of 2023

Abigail Kim, Class of 2024

XiaoshuoNLP: an NLP pipeline for processing Chinese literary text

Kiara Liu, Class of 2023

Miranda Zhu, Class of 2023

Machine learning tools for identifying and classifying marginalia in medieval manuscripts

Angel Ding, Class of 2023

Exploring code generation models: promises and pitfalls

Rachelle Hu, Class of 2025

Sydney Nguyen, Class of 2024

Honors thesis advising

I am also advising a number of honors thesis projects.

Exploring Name Bias in NLP Models

Skylar Kolisko, Class of 2023

TBA

Michelle Zhao, Class of 2022

Research positions

I don't anticipate taking on any new students in Fall 2022.

I generally look for students who have taken at least one CS class and at least one Linguistics class.
